message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for a price of $13,000. I believe it represents excellent value considering its potential worth to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm eager to make a deal, $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $11,500.  It's a fair offer reflecting the value it brings.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,500. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
